description.full:
Express complex emotions in ways beyond words. Custom Stickers app helps you to save and send your own stickers in Microsoft Teams.
[#LI] You can upload your stickers from PC or cell phones;[/#LI]
[#LI] You can save stickers form others' messages;[/#LI]
[#LI] You can send your own stickers in chat;[/#LI]
[#LI] You can manage and edit your stickers' name.[/#LI]
Custom Stickers provides a management tool inside of Teams for all users to save and send GIF to friends, which is an effective form of visual communication because of the animation that provides a greater range of expression.
The tool facilities a place to help user upload stickers/GIFs from PC or mobile device. User could select one or more saved stickers and choose to upload. Once uploaded successfully, all materials could be found by clicking Sticker icon from toolbar to launch the Sticker window.
To better manage all stickers, the tool also makes it easy to rename, delete or search a GIF.
 User could send GIF to Teams friends by selecting one from Sticker list while chatting with them, with above management capabilities, browsing to find a GIF becomes more efficient.
User also can save a GIF shared by others if they’re using the same tool. By clicking “…” from right-up corner of the messaging card, there’s a button of “Save to Sticker”. Click the button and it’ll be added to user’s list.
Being developed both for PC and mobile app, user could find the full functions across platforms. To maintain a personal GIFlist could help better express oneself, user doesn’t need to browse from a 3rd party GIF provider for minutes. With this tool, user could build a rich and personalized sticker pool and enjoy the communication in Teams.
